thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Derek S.
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Derek S.

author: Derek S.
title: Derek S.
text:
I ordered the ogio polo with custom stitching. My logo is very detailed so I was skeptical it would turn out decent....I had nothing to worry about. Their work was exceptional and top notch. I'm proud to wear my shirts and feel they did a great job!
I will definitely be ordering from them in the future
